LanguageData.AlterPollutionRaidDescription: This will replace the original pollution raid with an epic siege.
LanguageData.ESM_AlterDaysBeforeRaidDescription: Change how many days before the epic raid can occur. Default 1.5
LanguageData.ESM_AdditionalMultiplierDescription: Multiply the raid points. Default 1 (no multiplier)
LanguageData.ESM_RaidPhase1Description: Select the raid type (2 = Mortar siege, 1 = Breach assault, 0 = Immediate raid)
LanguageData.ESM_RaidPhase2Description: Select the raid type (2 = Mortar siege, 1 = Breach assault, 0 = Immediate raid)
LanguageData.ESM_RaidPhase3Description: Select the raid type (2 = Mortar siege, 1 = Breach assault, 0 = Immediate raid)
LanguageData.ESM_CustomRaidPhases: Customize raid phases. Warning: • Raid timing is determined by dividing 21600 ticks by the number of remaining sites. • Although labeled as Raid Phase 1–3, they may not occur in order due to TPS dependency. • If the number of sites for the same faction exceeds the limit (3), such as by changing the Incident category, the raid timing will be randomized within 21600 ticks.
